text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/25e0f5863e9010a75a1ff0d04e8f886403968755|patch 8.2.0823: Vim9: script reload test is disabled>
patch 8.2.0823: Vim9: script reload test is disabled

Problem:    Vim9: script reload test is disabled.
Solution:   Compile a function in the context of the script where it was
            defined.  Set execution stack for compiled function.  Add a test
            that an error is reported for the right file/function.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/1919371b2b9ddb1a645f40b59adbd89317530882|patch 8.2.0824: still not enough memory allocated when converting string>
patch 8.2.0824: still not enough memory allocated when converting string

Problem:    Still not enough memory allocated when converting string with
            special character.
Solution:   Reserve space for expanding K_SPECIAL. (closes #6130)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0824: still not enough memory allocated when converting string · vim/vim@1919371
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0824: still not enough memory allocated when converting string · vim/vim@1919371
attachments.text: Problem: Still not enough memory allocated when converting string with special character. Solution: Reserve space for expanding K_SPECIAL. (closes #6130)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a14e6975478adeddcc2161edc1ec611016aa89f3|patch 8.2.0825: def_function() may return pointer that was freed>
patch 8.2.0825: def_function() may return pointer that was freed

Problem:    def_function() may return pointer that was freed.
Solution:   Set "fp" to NULL after freeing it.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0825: def_function() may return pointer that was freed · vim/vim@a14e697
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0825: def_function() may return pointer that was freed · vim/vim@a14e697
attachments.text: Problem: def_function() may return pointer that was freed. Solution: Set "fp" to NULL after freeing it.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ebc3de634f4c2893f34e41b4f8da1d59212e59ea|patch 8.2.0826: Vim9: crash in :defcompile>
patch 8.2.0826: Vim9: crash in :defcompile

Problem:    Vim9: crash in :defcompile.
Solution:   Restart the loop after a call to compile_def_function() caused the
            hash table to resize.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0826: Vim9: crash in :defcompile · vim/vim@ebc3de6
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0826: Vim9: crash in :defcompile · vim/vim@ebc3de6
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: crash in :defcompile. Solution: Restart the loop after a call to compile_def_function() caused the hash table to resize.

patch 8.2.0827: Vim9: crash in :defcompile
